Excellent Quality and Presentation....Great Upload, Thanks!

The Diet is almost impossible for us mortals to do, but if you have a gym membership with plenty of time on you hands...go for it.

Very Strict and very difficult to achieve....you could lose weight just by doing the exercises...

or, ignore the book and just go for a decent walk a day and watch what you eat.....simples!
